All functions

add_landcover_desc()

Add 'extra' ecosystem descriptions

cut_cov

Cover class threshold values

cut_ht

Height class threshold values

lucover

Lookup for cover codes

lulandcover

Lookup for landcover classes and their associated colours

lulifeform

Lookup for lifeform codes

lulifespan

Lookup for lifespan classes

make_eco_desc()

Make a (biotic) description for an ecosystem

make_eco_desc_old()

Make a (biotic) description for an ecosystem

make_eco_env()

Make a dataframe summarising environmental variables per cluster.

make_eco_str_per()

Create a dataframe of taxa percent cover for each cluster

make_eco_taxa_per()

Create a dataframe of taxa percent cover for each cluster

sa_sf

Lookup for broad structural formations

sa_vsf

Lookup for South Australian vegetation structural formations

set_eco_col()

Set colours for individual ecosystems, using gradations within ecotype

taxa_samphire

Vector of samphire taxa

taxa_wetland

Vector of wetland taxa
